bibl.title: Telegram from Lawrence Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, August 16, 1900

div1.p: Lawrence Reed provides his new address in Cuba.

div1.head: Telegram from Lawrence Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, August 16, 1900
div1.opener:
Form No. 1
CABLE MESSAGE.
THE WESTERN UNION TELEGRAPH COMPANY.
Aug 16" 1900.
All CABLE MESSAGES received for transmission must be written on the Message Blanks provided by this Company for that purpose, under and subject to
the conditions printed thereon, and on the back hereof, which conditions have been agreed to by the sender of the following message.
THOS. T. ECKERT, General Manager. NORVIN GREEN, President.
NUMBER / SENT BY / REC'D BY / No. OF WORDS / FROM /
613 Hf. Jn 10 Havana
Received at BLUE RIDGE PA
To Mrs Reed
div1.p:
Blue Ridge Summit
Address Rowell Barracks.
Cienfugeos Advise father
